page.title: 11The Baptist Chapel
page.content: The summer of 1985 was an important and historic time for the Baptist Church. The 14th April saw the enrolment of the First West Haddon Company of the Boys Brigade. The Company was formed on 6th February 1985 and provided activities for boys aged 11 to 15. July also saw a new event for the Baptist Church. This was a week camp for children of the Sunday School and 21 young people spent an enjoyable week in a church hall at Cromer. In order to raise funds for the camp many of the chidren took part in a snooker marathon, the children being divide into two teams and playing continuous snooker until one team reached 26 frames. It took 23 hours.
